documentation.text:
@author Syndicate Inc.
 @notice Core module for owner functionality
@notice The owner updates the contract fee address.

@notice Transfers ownership to the provided address.
 @param newOwner The new owner's address.

@author Syndicate Inc.
 @notice Core module for owner functionality
@notice The owner updates the contract fee address.

@notice Transfers ownership to the provided address.
 @param newOwner The new owner's address.

params.owner: Address of contract owner upon deployment. Typically should be `syndicateFeeAddress`.

getSyndicateFeeAddress().details: This function is needed to allow inheriting contracts to only be able to view but not change syndicateFeeAddress without going through ownerSetSyndicateFeeAddress

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.feeAddress: The owner's new contract fee address

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

SyndicateFeeAddressUpdated(address).notice: The owner updates the contract fee address.

constructor.notice: Used to initialize the SyndicateOwnershipLogic contract.Passing in 0x0 for owner will fail as it is checked by `transferOwnership`.

getSyndicateFeeAddress().notice: getter function for syndicate fee address.

ownerSetSyndicateFeeAddress(address).notice: set a new fee address for the contract function that can only be triggered by the contract owner.

ownerTransferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership to the provided address.
